demos_list.title: PocketFlow Backend API
demos_list.description: A scalable backend API built with Pocketflow and FastAPI that powers an AI chat application. It uses Celery for asynchronous background tasks like ingesting and processing documents, ensuring the system is both responsive and powerful.

demos_list.description: A modern frontend built with Next.js and React, providing a seamless user experience for the AI chat application. It integrates Supabase for secure user authentication and communicates with the custom FastAPI backend.
